Improvements.Improvement: Use switch case instead of multiple if else
Improvements.Description: Instead of using multiple if else conditions for checking `browserVersion_`, you can use switch case. It will make the code more readable and maintainable.

Improvements.Improvement: Assign default value to expectedAlerts directly
Improvements.Description: Instead of assigning an empty array to `expectedAlerts` and then assigning `NO_ALERTS_DEFINED` if `alerts` is not null, we can directly assign `NO_ALERTS_DEFINED`.
